verses.verse: וַיִּקְבְּצ֧וּ <WH6908> gathered together פְלִשְׁתִּ֛ים <WH6430> Now the Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַחֲנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4264> all their armies אֲפֵ֑קָה <WH663> to Aphek וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> and the Israelites חֹנִ֔ים <WH2583> pitched בַּעַ֖יִן <WH5869> by a fountain אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בְּיִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <WH3157> which [is] in Jezreel

וְסַרְנֵ֤י <WH5633> And the lords פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> of the Philistines עֹֽבְרִ֔ים <WH5674> passed on לְמֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> by hundreds וְלַאֲלָפִ֑ים <WH505> and by thousands וְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> but David וַאֲנָשָׁ֗יו <WH376> and his men עֹֽבְרִ֛ים <WH5674> passed on בָּאַחֲרֹנָ֖ה <WH314> in the rereward עִם־ <WH5973> with אָכִֽישׁ׃ <WH397> with Achish

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> Then said שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> the princes פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines מָ֖ה <WH4100> What הָעִבְרִ֣ים <WH5680> What [do] these Hebrews הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אָכִ֜ישׁ <WH397> [here]? And Achish אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> unto the princes פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> no זֶ֨ה <WH2088> is this דָוִ֜ד <WH1732> [Is] not this David עֶ֣בֶד ׀ <WH5650> the servant שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> of Saul מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> has been אִתִּי֙ <WH854> for זֶ֤ה <WH2088> these יָמִים֙ <WH3117> which hath been with me these days אוֹ־ <WH176> or זֶ֣ה <WH2088> these שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> or these years וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no מָצָ֤אתִי <WH4672> and I have found בוֹ֙ מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> no fault מִיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> in him since נָפְל֖וֹ <WH5307> he fell עַד־ <WH5704> from הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> the day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this פ

וַיִּקְצְפ֨וּ <WH7107> were wroth עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> But שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> And the princes פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> said לוֹ֩ שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> with him and the princes פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> of the Philistines הָשֵׁ֣ב <WH7725> return אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> this fellow וְיָשֹׁב֙ <WH7725> that he may go again אֶל־ <WH413> to his מְקוֹמוֹ֙ <WH4725> to his place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you הִפְקַדְתּ֣וֹ <WH6485> which thou hast appointed שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> us וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> or יֵרֵ֤ד <WH3381> him and let him not go down עִמָּ֙נוּ֙ <WH5973> with בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> with us to battle וְלֹא־ <WH3808> or יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> may become לָּ֥נוּ לְשָׂטָ֖ן <WH7854> he be an adversary בַּמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> lest in the battle וּבַמֶּ֗ה <WH4100> what יִתְרַצֶּ֥ה <WH7521> to us for wherewith should he reconcile זֶה֙ <WH2088> this אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> master הֲל֕וֹא <WH3808> or בְּרָאשֵׁ֖י <WH7218> band הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH582> another הָהֵֽם׃ <WH1992> of these

הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> not זֶ֣ה <WH2088> is this דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> [Is] not this David אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> of whom יַעֲנוּ־ <WH6030> of whom they sang ל֛וֹ בַּמְּחֹל֖וֹת <WH4246> one to another in dances לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הִכָּ֤ה <WH5221> slew שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> Saul בַּֽאֲלָפָ֔יו <WH505> his thousands וְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> and David [בְּרִבְבֹתֹו כ] (בְּרִבְבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH7233> many ק) ס

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called אָכִ֜ישׁ <WH397> Then Achish אֶל־ <WH413> about דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> David וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵ֠לָיו <WH413> about חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> unto him Surely [as] the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for יָשָׁ֣ר <WH3477> thou hast been upright אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you וְט֣וֹב <WH2896> [is] good בְּ֠עֵינַי <WH5869> in my sight צֵאתְךָ֨ <WH3318> and thy going out וּבֹאֲךָ֤ <WH935> and thy coming in אִתִּי֙ <WH854> in בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> with me in the host כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not מָצָ֤אתִֽי <WH4672> for I have not found בְךָ֙ רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> evil מִיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> in thee since the day בֹּאֲךָ֥ <WH935> of thy coming אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about עַד־ <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto me unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this וּבְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> thee not הַסְּרָנִ֖ים <WH5633> nevertheless the lords לֹֽא־ <WH3808> are not ט֥וֹב <WH2896> favour אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

וְעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> Now שׁ֖וּב <WH7725> Wherefore now return וְלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> and go בְּשָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> in peace וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> accomplish רָ֔ע <WH7451> adversity בְּעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> affliction סַרְנֵ֥י <WH5633> not the lords פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to אָכִ֗ישׁ <WH397> unto Achish כִּ֣י <WH3588> But מֶ֤ה <WH4100> what עָשִׂ֙יתִי֙ <WH6213> But what have I done וּמַה־ <WH4100> what מָּצָ֣אתָ <WH4672> ? and what hast thou found בְעַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> in thy servant מִיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> so long as אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> when הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> came לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> I have been with thee עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> may not אָבוֹא֙ <WH935> that I may not go וְנִלְחַ֔מְתִּי <WH3898> fight בְּאֹיְבֵ֖י <WH341> against the enemies אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> of my lord הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> king

וַיַּ֣עַן <WH6030> answered אָכִישׁ֮ <WH397> And Achish וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִד֒ <WH1732> to David יָדַ֕עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִּ֣י <WH3588> that ט֥וֹב <WH2896> that thou [art] good אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> in בְּעֵינַ֖י <WH5869> in my sight כְּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> as an angel אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God אַ֣ךְ <WH389> nevertheless שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> notwithstanding the princes פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> of the Philistines אָֽמְר֔וּ <WH559> have said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> must not יַעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> He shall not go up עִמָּ֖נוּ <WH5973> us בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> with us to the battle

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <WH7925> Wherefore now rise up early בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וְעַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> servants אֲדֹנֶ֖יךָ <WH113> with thy master's אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> that are come אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> for וְהִשְׁכַּמְתֶּ֣ם <WH7925> with thee and as soon as ye be up early בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וְא֥וֹר <WH215> and have light לָכֶ֖ם וָלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> depart

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <WH7925> rose up early דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> So David ה֤וּא <WH1931> he וַֽאֲנָשָׁיו֙ <WH582> and his men לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to depart בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning לָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> to return אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> into the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> And the Philistines עָל֥וּ <WH5927> went up יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <WH3157> to Jezreel ס
